attributes.action: realise that the earth cannot be saved by staging rock concerts! - However green they CLAIM to make them!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Everyone has heard of green music concerts which are meant to raise the awareness of green issues to public.

Who actually thought that these events would in any way save energy! 
It would take less energy and be more energy efficent to post a flyer to every house in the country, explaining how they can get off their backsides and recycle! -tell them where their nearest recycling centers are, what schemes are available! 
And when they have read and absorbed they could put their flyer in a paper recycling bin!
In the news today there are so many stories on human rights, we have rights blah blah blah. 
Isn't it our right to have the taxes we are forced to pay, used in winning the fight against climate change and help save the world we live in! 

Come on people let's get real and smell the decaying earth!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
